main event: An unidentified object was observed traveling as a stream of yellow to white sparks over Albuquerque, New Mexico, on 26 July 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as a trail of fire and was in a descending flight for 6-8 seconds,The flight occurred entirely under cloud cover,The object changed direction to southeast abruptly before disappearing,Witnesses reported that it appeared to climb as it disappeared,No sound was heard during the observation.
sighted object: a trail of fire traveling in the sky
witness description: information about the observer not provided
